description: The DeleteScraper operation deletes one scraper, and stops any metrics collection that the scraper performs.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: (Optional) A unique, case-sensitive identifier that you can provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: scraperId
parameters.description: The ID of the scraper to delete.

nested_items.name: scraperId
nested_items.description: The ID of the scraper to delete.

nested_items.name: statusCode
nested_items.description: The current status of the scraper.
